mods.title: Mega Mushroom Expansion Pack
mods.shortDescription: Transform into a giant Mario with new abilities and physics-based destruction
mods.detailedDescription: Experience Mario like never before with the Mega Mushroom Expansion Pack! This mod introduces the classic Mega Mushroom power-up with enhanced physics, destructible environments, and completely new gameplay mechanics. Crush enemies, break through blocks, and discover hidden areas only accessible in mega form. Compatible with all world themes and includes custom sound effects.
features: Transform into Giant Mario with realistic physics simulation
Destructible environment system - break through walls and platforms
New enemy interactions and defeat animations
Custom sound effects and visual effects
Compatible with multiplayer mode
Includes 5 exclusive Mega-only challenge levels
Performance optimized for smooth 60 FPS gameplay
mods.activation: Extract to game directory > Enable in Mods menu > Press L+R during gameplay to activate Mega form

mods.title: Retro Remix Soundtrack
mods.shortDescription: Complete audio overhaul with 8-bit remixes of classic Mario themes
mods.detailedDescription: Relive the nostalgia with over 50 professionally remastered 8-bit tracks! This comprehensive audio mod replaces every music track and sound effect in the game with crystal-clear retro remixes. Each track has been carefully crafted to maintain the spirit of the original while adding modern production quality. Includes dynamic music layers that respond to gameplay.
features: 50+ remastered music tracks in authentic 8-bit style
200+ enhanced sound effects with chip-tune authenticity
Dynamic music system that changes with gameplay intensity
Individual volume controls for music, SFX, and voice
Lossless audio quality for maximum fidelity
Custom jukebox feature to play any track on demand
Zero performance impact on gameplay
mods.activation: Install via Mod Manager > Restart game > Audio changes take effect immediately

mods.title: Castle Builder Pro
mods.shortDescription: Level editor with drag-and-drop interface and 500+ custom assets
mods.detailedDescription: Unleash your creativity with the most powerful Mario level editor ever created! Castle Builder Pro features an intuitive drag-and-drop interface, hundreds of custom objects, and advanced scripting capabilities. Share your creations with the community and download levels from other builders. Perfect for both beginners and expert level designers.
features: Intuitive drag-and-drop level editor interface
500+ custom objects, enemies, and platforms
Advanced scripting system for custom behaviors
Built-in physics testing and debugging tools
One-click sharing to online community portal
Import/Export levels in multiple formats
Real-time multiplayer co-op editing mode
Includes 20 tutorial templates to get started
mods.activation: Launch via Mods menu > Select 'Level Editor' > Press F1 for tutorial

mods.title: Yoshi Rainbow Riders
mods.shortDescription: Unlock 8 different colored Yoshis, each with unique special abilities
mods.detailedDescription: Meet the Yoshi Rainbow Riders! This mod introduces 8 uniquely colored Yoshis, each with their own special ability and personality. From Blue Yoshi's water abilities to Purple Yoshi's toxic breath, discover new ways to traverse levels and defeat enemies. All Yoshis feature custom animations, sounds, and balanced gameplay mechanics.
features: 8 different colored Yoshis with unique abilities
Red Yoshi: Fire breath that melts ice blocks
Blue Yoshi: Water spray for underwater advantages
Yellow Yoshi: Ground pound creates shockwaves
Purple Yoshi: Toxic breath damages multiple enemies
Custom animations and personality traits for each
Multiplayer mode supports different Yoshis per player
Unlock system with progression achievements
mods.activation: Install mod > Complete first castle > Unlock Yoshi stables > Select your Yoshi

mods.title: HD Texture Overhaul 4K
mods.shortDescription: High-definition texture pack maintaining the retro art style with modern clarity
mods.detailedDescription: Experience Mario in stunning 4K resolution while preserving the iconic pixel art aesthetic! This comprehensive texture pack upscales every sprite, background, and UI element using advanced AI algorithms. The result is crisp, clear visuals that look incredible on modern displays without losing the retro charm. Optional filters let you customize the look to your preference.
features: 4K resolution textures for all game assets
AI-upscaled sprites maintaining pixel art style
Enhanced background parallax layers
Crystal-clear UI and menu systems
Multiple visual presets: Classic, Enhanced, Ultra
Optimized for both performance and quality
Compatible with all other visual mods
Automatic resolution scaling based on hardware
mods.activation: Extract to textures folder > Select 'HD Mode' in graphics options > Restart level

mods.title: Bowser Boss Rush Ultimate
mods.shortDescription: Face 15 challenging Bowser variations with unique attack patterns
mods.detailedDescription: Think you've mastered Mario? Face the ultimate challenge with Bowser Boss Rush Ultimate! Battle through 15 increasingly difficult Bowser variants, each with unique attack patterns, special abilities, and environmental hazards. Unlock special rewards, speedrun modes, and leaderboard rankings. Only the most skilled players will claim victory!
features: 15 unique Bowser boss fights with custom mechanics
Progressive difficulty scaling and attack patterns
Special rewards for completing challenges
Speedrun timer with online leaderboards
Multiple difficulty modes: Normal, Hard, Insane
Boss arena has dynamic environmental hazards
Unlock secret Super Bowser final encounter
Custom boss music tracks for each battle
mods.activation: Available after completing main story > Access via 'Challenge Portal' in castle

mods.title: Pipe World Secret Expansion
mods.shortDescription: 10 new secret worlds accessible through hidden warp pipes
mods.detailedDescription: Discover a whole new dimension of Mario! The Pipe World Secret Expansion adds 10 completely original worlds hidden throughout the game. Each world features unique themes, enemies, and challenges. From the Crystal Caverns to the Sky Palace, explore beautifully crafted environments with hundreds of secrets to uncover. This mod doubles your gameplay time!
features: 10 brand new worlds with unique themes
Over 80 new levels to explore
Hidden warp pipes scattered throughout original game
New enemy types exclusive to secret worlds
Unique power-ups and collectibles in each world
Progressive unlock system rewards exploration
Custom world maps with multiple paths
Estimated 20+ hours of additional gameplay
mods.activation: Install mod > Look for glowing green pipes in original levels > Jump in to discover!

mods.title: Co-op Chaos Multiplayer
mods.shortDescription: Enhanced 4-player co-op with team challenges and competitive minigames
mods.detailedDescription: Mario is better with friends! Co-op Chaos Multiplayer transforms the game into the ultimate party experience. Play through the entire campaign with up to 4 players in cooperative mode, or compete in dozens of original minigames. Features team challenges, versus modes, and a dedicated party hub. Online and local multiplayer supported!
features: 4-player cooperative campaign mode
30+ competitive minigames and challenges
Team-based boss battles with coordination mechanics
Online and local multiplayer support
Drop-in/drop-out gameplay at any time
Shared coin collection with team bonuses
Dedicated party hub with matchmaking
Custom lobby system with game mode voting
mods.activation: Launch from main menu > Select 'Multiplayer Mode' > Invite friends or join online lobby

mods.title: Speedrun Toolkit Pro
mods.shortDescription: Professional speedrunning tools with splits, practice mode, and frame-perfect inputs
mods.detailedDescription: Master every frame with Speedrun Toolkit Pro! Designed for serious speedrunners and competitive players, this mod includes split timers, save states, practice mode, input display, and frame-by-frame analysis tools. Study optimal routes, practice difficult tricks, and track your improvement. Integrates with popular speedrun platforms for automatic submission.
features: Customizable split timer with segment tracking
Save state system for practicing difficult sections
Input display showing frame-perfect inputs
Frame-by-frame advance for studying techniques
Route planning tool with visual markers
Automatic best-time tracking and comparison
Integration with speedrun.com for submissions
Ghost data to race against your personal bests
mods.activation: Enable in Mods menu > Press F3 to open toolkit > Configure splits and practice mode

mods.title: Luigi's Mansion Mode
mods.shortDescription: Play as Luigi with his Poltergust vacuum in spooky mansion-themed levels
mods.detailedDescription: Step into Luigi's shoes with this atmospheric total conversion mod! Luigi's Mansion Mode reimagines classic levels with spooky mansion themes and introduces Luigi's iconic Poltergust vacuum. Suck up ghosts, solve paranormal puzzles, and explore haunted environments. Features completely new gameplay mechanics, enemy types, and a darker aesthetic while maintaining the Mario charm.
features: Play as Luigi with unique movement physics
Poltergust vacuum mechanic for ghost catching
15 mansion-themed levels with atmospheric lighting
New ghost enemy types with AI behaviors
Paranormal puzzle mechanics and hidden rooms
Flashlight mechanic to reveal secrets
Haunted collectibles and ghost gallery
Original spooky soundtrack and sound effects
mods.activation: Select 'Luigi Mode' from character menu > Complete tutorial mansion > Full campaign unlocks

mods.title: Ultimate Randomizer
mods.shortDescription: Complete game randomization with customizable chaos settings
mods.detailedDescription: No two playthroughs are ever the same! Ultimate Randomizer shuffles every aspect of the game - enemy placements, item locations, level order, physics, and even color palettes. With dozens of customization options, you can create anything from slightly unpredictable to absolute chaos. Perfect for endless replayability and challenge runs. Seed sharing lets you race friends on identical randomized games.
features: Randomize enemies, items, and level layouts
Physics randomization for unique movement
Color palette shuffling for visual variety
Customizable chaos levels: Mild to Extreme
Seed system for sharing exact randomizations
Logic-based randomization ensures completability
Daily challenge seeds with leaderboards
Save and load custom randomization profiles
mods.activation: Main menu > Randomizer Options > Choose settings > Generate seed > Start new game

mods.title: Toad Rescue Missions
mods.shortDescription: Side quest system with 50 Toad rescue missions and unique rewards
mods.detailedDescription: The Toads need your help! This mod adds an extensive side quest system with 50 unique rescue missions scattered throughout the game. Each Toad has their own personality, backstory, and special reward. Track missions in your journal, unlock new abilities, and discover hidden storylines. Completing all missions rewards you with the ultimate secret ending!
features: 50 unique Toad rescue missions with stories
Mission journal with tracking and hints
Special rewards and unlockable abilities
Hidden dialogue trees and character development
Secret ending for 100% completion
Toad village hub that grows with rescues
Time-based missions and optional challenges
Multiple solution paths for creative gameplay
mods.activation: Installed automatically > Check map for Toad distress signals > Approach to start mission

mods.title: Star Power Expansion
mods.shortDescription: Enhanced star power with 5 transformation types and combo system
mods.detailedDescription: Star power like never before! This mod completely overhauls the star power-up system, introducing 5 different transformation types based on how many stars you collect. Build combos by defeating enemies, trigger spectacular visual effects, and unlock ultimate abilities. Features a dynamic score multiplier system and achievement tracking for skilled players.
features: 5 star transformation tiers with unique effects
Combo system with score multipliers
Dynamic visual effects and screen shake
Ultimate ability: Rainbow Star Burst attack
Extended star duration with combo maintenance
Achievement system for advanced techniques
Custom particle effects and lighting
Compatible with multiplayer modes
mods.activation: Install mod > Collect star as normal > Build combos to unlock higher tiers

mods.title: Dynamic Weather System
mods.shortDescription: Real-time weather effects including rain, snow, wind, and storms
mods.detailedDescription: Experience Mario worlds in a whole new light with the Dynamic Weather System! This mod adds real-time weather that affects both visuals and gameplay. Rain makes surfaces slippery, wind affects jump trajectories, snow reduces visibility, and thunderstorms create dangerous lightning. Each weather type features stunning particle effects and changes enemy behavior patterns.
features: 5 weather types: Rain, Snow, Wind, Storm, Fog
Dynamic weather transitions and cycles
Gameplay-affecting weather mechanics
Realistic particle systems and sound effects
Weather influences enemy AI and behavior
Optional weather forecast system
Performance-optimized particle rendering
Compatible with all world themes
mods.activation: Enable in Mods menu > Weather appears naturally during gameplay > Toggle forecast in options

mods.title: Classic Mode Authentic
mods.shortDescription: Authentic NES-era physics, graphics, and sound for ultimate nostalgia
mods.detailedDescription: Travel back to 1985 with Classic Mode Authentic! This total conversion mod recreates the exact physics, graphics, sound, and even bugs from the original NES Mario games. Every detail has been meticulously researched and recreated, from sprite flickering to frame-perfect jump mechanics. Perfect for purists and speedrunners who want the authentic classic experience.
features: Authentic NES-era physics engine
Original 8-bit sprite graphics
Classic chiptune audio reproduction
Historical bug preservation for speedrunning
CRT filter with scan lines and color bleeding
4:3 aspect ratio with border art
Input latency matching original hardware
Accurate frame rate (60.0988 FPS)
mods.activation: Select 'Classic Mode' from main menu > All settings auto-configured > Play pure nostalgia
